subject: AW: [junit] Research on the success of JUnit on projects
msgSnippet: You could look in this newsgroup for a mail from Kent Beck where he forwarded a comparison of Java code testing frameworks. JUnit was the 2nd or 3rd best. I
messageBody:
You could look in this newsgroup for a mail from Kent Beck where he
forwarded a comparison of Java code testing frameworks. JUnit was the 2nd or
3rd best.

I can just say, JUnit offers all you need and does a really fine job!!!
You don't need more.

Once you have familiarized yourself with it you should take a look at
www.mockobjects.com


Lucas
